post.body: yes i believe organization or lack of it definitely influences our temper- thanks for your input ;o)
Wonderful- And yours? Also-I’m asking moms this question: What things do U do that help you with self control & patience?
i use an online Bible concordance a lot when researching subjects: http://www.tgm.org/bible.htm
Amen- so true Susan- fear is lack of faith in God thanks for sharing ;o)
Lord please come over JoJo at this time and help her and heal her headache- please relieve her pain in Jesus' name Amen
hi Ram- you're always somebody ;o) Just though I would remind you...
hi Susan the link goes to an error page - was there a letter missing?
to think that lack of dominion and patience is totally related to pride and selfishness- never thought of it that way...
Amen- yes that change of perspective brings more of a humble attitude which helps so much with self control. That leads me ..
so i tweeted that more as a reminder to pray without ceasing so we can live more in the spirit than in the flesh ;o)
The Lord showed me this week that my prayer life was weak bcuz i wasn't depending enough on Him in my heart- 2 much on myself
That's okay the stream is so fast that even though i tried to put them together quickly they went apart ;o)
woohoo! Happy New Years girl- wishing you a fantabulous 2009 ;o)
I nominate @CindyRushton for a Shorty Award in #encourager because she is such a joy to listen to and God uses her so much
Just to do God's will brother and further His Kingdom
You're not depending on Him for strength to do His will here on Earth (even if you're Christian) “Pray without ceasing” IThessalonians 5:17
Ask yourself this question: Is prayer an integral part of my daily life? If the answer is NO - then even though you may believe in God,
To all moms out there: What things do you do that help you with self control and patience? What has worked the best for you over the years?
7 free Christian songs for you to download by artist Tina Osborn http://www.tinaosborn.com/ Happy New Years Tweetpals ;o)
Happy New Years Twitter friends:o)
